title: [Weave and Wear]
description: Smaller than the other areas of the wagon, the work area is cluttered with boxes and crates.  Various tools and materials are scattered over the surface of a worn, marble-topped table.  A large chalkboard dominates the wall above.   Pushed to the side is a small wooden bench, the floor underneath carpeted with bits of discarded blossoms and greenery.
